home.whoami: 23 year old Frenchman, I have graduated with a Bachelor of Computing and I have been working in Ireland for more than 2 years now. I always have been passionate about new technologies, particularly mobile and web development. More recently, I have been interested in AI centered around tabletop games.
home.have-a-look: You can have a look at the projects I'm working on by looking at my portfolio!
home.know-more: Do you want to know more about me and my career?

about.title: About me
about.description: In this section you will find more about me, my education and the projects I have worked on so far!

items.title: Full Stack Software Developer
list: Facilitated and hosted a Web application using Firebase
Implemented a realtime fleet tracking system with Google Maps
Designed and developed a UI to filter and sort artworks
Learnt to prioritize my missions by using an issue tracking system

items.title: Final Year Project : Transport AI
items.location: Cork Institute Of Technology, Cork, Ireland
list: Developed a mobile application to book the nearest self-driving car
The data was stored and retrieved using Firebase
Google Maps API was used to display user location

items.title: BSc in Software Development
items.location: Cork Institute Of Technology, Cork, Ireland
list: Mobile Device Programming & Object Oriented Programming
Server-side Web Development & Agile Processes
Open Source Project & Cloud Networking

items.title: Android Internship
list: Developed a mobile application using Kotlin for MenuOnline web users
Used a RESTful API to synchronize data
Retrieved data from the API endpoint with Retrofit
Understood the importance of CI tools and Unit testing with Robotelectric

items.title: Final Year Project: Reprography App
list: Established a web application that handle photocopies requests
The project was carried out using Symfony Framework (PHP)
Learnt the importance of the Model View Controller

items.title: PHP Internship
list: Created a client-side interface for customers to book a training session
Carried out an administration panel to manage the bookings using Dolibarr
Billed customers using Stripe API

items.title: DUT Informatique
items.text: A two year university Diploma in Computing, Core Modules:
list: Mobile & web application development
Object-Oriented programming & OOP Design pattern
IT Project Management & Network Administration

items.title: Baccalauréat STI2D SIN
items.text: Leaving certificat with special emphasis on programming & engineering.
list: C & Embedded programming
Arduino & Mechanical Engineering
